Getting Started

  • Brilliant Blunders by Mario Livio
    Call Number: Q172.5.E77 L58 2013
    ISBN: 9781439192368
    Publication Date: 2013-05-14

Biographical Information on Scientists

Scope: The following sources are useful for finding biographical information on scientists. For more information contact Nedelina Tchangalova at nedelina@umd.edu.

Tips for Getting Started

When searching for biographies, it helps to know some basic facts about the person you are researching. You can often find very basic information about a person by checking an encyclopedia such as:

In PrintOnline
McGraw-Hill Encyclopedia of Science & Technology (http://catalog.umd.edu/docno=002336822)       Encyclopedia Britannica (http://researchport.umd.edu/source=UMD01788)
Van Nostrand's Concise Encyclopedia of Science (http://catalog.umd.edu/docno=002865124)       Columbia Encyclopedia (http://www.bartleby.com/65/)
Encyclopedia Americana (http://catalog.umd.edu/docno=002445430)
